name: Camera Trap Specialist
description: A specialized model trained specifically for detecting animals in camera trap images. Optimized for low-light conditions and wildlife photography scenarios commonly found in camera trap setups. Excellent performance with domestic and wild animals.
optimal_conditions: Outdoor camera traps, varying lighting conditions
training_dataset: Custom camera trap dataset with 15,000 annotated images
performance_notes: High accuracy in detecting multiple animal species simultaneously. Robust to weather conditions and image quality variations.

name: YOLO Universal
description: Pre-trained YOLOv8 nano model from Ultralytics. General-purpose object detection model with good performance across various scenarios. Lightweight and fast, suitable for real-time applications and devices with limited computational resources.
optimal_conditions: General purpose, various lighting and environmental conditions
performance_notes: Balanced speed and accuracy. Good baseline model for general object detection tasks.
